reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend who loves skateboarding. This is perfect for a diehard skateboarding fan. It's very old and kind of cheesy, but he loved the people in the DVD and glued himself to the TV watching it.
Perfect. Just how you might remember. It was on time for Christmas .

This is the movie I have been waiting to see!

It is pretty rare.

I was anticipating a classic 80's plot filled with goofy stunts etc...

NO. Animal Chin was never found and the whole movie was not a movie at all...

It was like a home video that an 8 year old filmed.

Damn! Save your money!

Good collectors piece though-Young Tony Hawk is so cute :)
